title: Euro, Bitcoin Fall As USD Raises On CPI Higher Than Expected
description: Last week, USD had its worst run in a few days as the markets were waiting for the customer inflation data. Last Tuesday (September 13, 2022), customer prices climbed more than expected, by 8.3% year to year in August; the news triggered a sell-off. EURUSD was down 1%, and BTCUSD lost 4%, as bulls are fighting to defend $21,000 support.
